name: Venlafaxine

dosing.adult_acute: Depression: 75 mg XR daily, may increase to 225 mg/day. Anxiety: 75-225 mg/day
dosing.notes: Take with food. XR preferred. Avoid IR formulation. Max 375 mg/day.

cautions.renal: Reduce dose 25-50% in moderate-severe renal impairment

warnings: Higher discontinuation syndrome vs SSRIs - MUST taper
